question: 刃
sourceAnswer:
<read>は</read>:: edge-(of-a-knife-or-sword) | prong-(of-an-electrical-plug)
<read>やいば</read>:: blade/sword | forged-blade/wavy-pattern-on-forged-blades | sharpness | unhulled-rice
userAnswer:
<tag><read>は</read>:</tag> {sword/knife}-{edge/blade} | prong/electrical-plug-prong
<tag><read>やいば</read>:</tag> blade/sword | forged-blade-(wavy-pattern) | sharpness

sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji.
